message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your acceptable range.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500, which reflects the significant value of this product. I'm confident this price is fair to both of us. Let's find a way to make this work.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still unable to go above $8,000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
